TopicTitle: KSP Music Video/Short Film: 3 Kerbals, Eve and Back, Single Rocket

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I only started playing this a few months ago and after learning how to travel around the Kerbin system I went straight for landing/returning from Eve on account of being as clueless as I am stubborn.

I figure it's all been done so rather than talk about my particular dumb design I think it's more my style to express how I vibe with the game/journey in the form of a short film of sorts. Hope it's something you can relate to or otherwise get a laugh out of:

In case you end up wondering:

1. Baby Elephant Walk - Henry Mancini

2. Quake -(Instrumental) -  August Burns Red

3. Eon Blue Apocalypse - Tool

4. Sleepwalker - A Skylit Drive

5. King of Sorrow (Instrumental) - August Burns Red

6. Heart of Courage - Two Steps From Hell
